content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a private landlord seeking the highest possible rental price for this apartment, I'll begin negotiations at 1250 Euros per month. However, please note that utilities, furnishings, and lease terms have not been discussed. If you find this proposal acceptable, say 'I agree to the price of [1250] Euro!' If not, let me know your suggested price or reason to end negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student following moral and ethical standards, I am looking for the lowest possible price considering my budget. I hope we can reach a more affordable agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation but regretfully, my primary objective is to secure the highest rent possible. If your budget permits a lower figure significantly closer to my initial offer, we might reconsider. Otherwise, TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
